configuration_keys.name: Id
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the FoundationaLLM instance.

configuration_keys.name: KeyVaultURI
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Key Vault providing the secrets.

dependency_injection_key.description: Dependency injection key used by the FoundationaLLM.AIModel resource provider.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the storage settings for the FoundationaLLM.AIModel resource provider.

configuration_keys.name: AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM.AIModel resource provider. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_keys.name: AccountName
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM.AIModel resource provider.

dependency_injection_key.description: Dependency injection key used by the FoundationaLLM.Agent resource provider.

configuration_keys.name: AuthenticationType
configuration_keys.description: The type of authentication used to connect to the Azure Blob Storage account used by the FoundationaLLM.Vectorization resource provider. Can be one of: AzureIdentity, AccountKey, or ConnectionString.

configuration_section.description: Configuration section used to identify the connection settings for the Authorization API. Due to its special nature, the Authorization API is the only API that does not have a corresponding APIEndpointConfiguration resource.

configuration_keys.name: APIUrl
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Authorization API.

configuration_keys.name: APIScope
configuration_keys.description: The scope required to get an access token for the Authorization API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Instance
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Entra ID instance used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: TenantId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID tenant used for authentication.

configuration_keys.name: Scopes
configuration_keys.description: The list of scopes exposed by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: CallbackPath
configuration_keys.description: The path where the Entra ID instance will redirect during authentication.

configuration_keys.name: ClientId
configuration_keys.description: The unique identifier of the Entra ID app registration used by the Core API to authenticate.

configuration_keys.name: ClientSecret
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the client secret associated with the Entra ID app registration used by the Core API to authenticate.

configuration_keys.name: BypassGatekeeper
configuration_keys.description: The flag that indicates whether the Core API should bypass or not the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: Endpoint
configuration_keys.description: The URL of the Azure Cosmos DB service used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Database
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Cosmos DB database used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: Containers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers used by the Core API.

configuration_keys.name: MonitoredContainers
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of database containers that are monitored for changes using the change feed.

configuration_keys.name: ChangeFeedLeaseContainer
configuration_keys.description: The name of the container used by Azure Cosmos DB to manage the change feed leases.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Core Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Core Worker service.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableLakeraGuard
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Lakera Guard is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableEnkryptGuardrails
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Enkrypt Guardrails is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableAzureContentSafetyPromptShields
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Azure Content Safety Prompt Shields is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: EnableMicrosoftPresidio
configuration_keys.description: Indicates whether Microsoft Presidio is available for use by the Gatekeeper API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Gatekeeper Integration API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Gatekeeper Integration API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Orchestration API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the connection string for the App Insights service used by the Orchestration API.

configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the LangChain API.

configuration_keys.name: AppInsightsConnectionString

configuration_keys.name: AzureOpenAIAccounts
configuration_keys.description: The comma-separated list of Azure OpenAI account names used by the Gateway API.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Azure Event Grid service.

configuration_keys.name: NamespaceId
configuration_keys.description: The object identifier of the Azure Event Grid Namespace object used by the Azure Event Grid event service.

configuration_keys.name: Profiles:CoreAPI
configuration_keys.description: The settings used by the Core API to process Azure Event Grid events.

configuration_keys.name: Profiles:OrchestrationAPI
configuration_keys.description: The settings used by the Orchestration API to process Azure Event Grid events.

configuration_keys.name: Profiles:ManagementAPI
configuration_keys.description: The settings used by the Management API to process Azure Event Grid events.

configuration_keys.name: Profiles:Vectorization
configuration_keys.description: The settings used by the Vectorization API to process Azure Event Grid events.

configuration_keys.name: Profiles:VectorizationWorker
configuration_keys.description: The settings used by the Vectorization Worker to process Azure Event Grid events.

configuration_keys.name: APIKey
configuration_keys.description: The name of the Azure Key Vault secret holding the API key for the Azure Content Safety service.

configuration_keys.name: HateSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of hate language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_keys.name: SelfHarmSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of self-harm language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_keys.name: SexualSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of sexual language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).

configuration_keys.name: ViolenceSeverity
configuration_keys.description: The maximum level of violent language that is allowed by the Azure Content Safety service (higher value means that a more severe language is allowed).
